amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to exempt from the provisions of bill any Federal law or regulation that regulates States and local governments regarding interstate matters that significantly impact the health or safety of residents of other States, or local governments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of two amendments printed in the Congressional Record of January 19 (Nos. 133 and 134), offered en bloc, to exempt from the provisions of bill all laws which regulate the conduct of States, local governments, or tribal governments with respect to matters that significantly impact the health or safety of residents of other States, and local or tribal governments.

action.text: On agreeing to the Towns amendments (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 252 (Roll no. 24).
